title: Unable to log you in because you may be offline
body: So I jumped into league today and it was working just fine,after a few hours however I tried to run the game again and it just says what I wrote as a title,I tried going in the files and deleting one line of code like a rioter posted to do about a month ago but nothing changed...still getting the same error,any advise? And no I am not offline.

replies.body:
This might have been some kind of coincidence with your connection at the time, but let's go ahead and run through some basic troubleshooting to make sure your network is still configured in the best way for League to run. 

Double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) paying attention to port forwarding and flushing your DNS, be sure to test those changes in a custom game, and let me know how that goes!
